column4: hi, i'm getting the "Package sun-java6-jdk has no installation candidate" error even after running " add-apt-repository "deb http://archive.canonical.com/ lucid partner"  ". Any fix for this?
oracle java is no longer on ubuntu repositories
you can try openjdk wich already is on ubuntu repository or manually download and install java from it's webpage
thanks! the only workaround i had found before this was building it with somebodys github script
